short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the number of job applicants for roles on LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever looked at a job on LinkedIn only to see that there were hundreds of applicants and become so discouraged that you didn't apply at all? The number of applicants listed for most jobs on LinkedIn is not accurate, yet there is no way to disable it. 

Download this extension to make your job search via LinkedIn a little less stressful and to feel empowered to apply to more open roles. 

You can view the source code here: www.github.com/garnetred/hide-linkedin-applicants. 

Love this extension? Consider making a donation: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/decemberthedeveloper.
